name: München Noir
description:
München Noir is a Shadowrun sourcebook detailing the city and region of Munich, Germany. It also contains a 60-page adventure campaign set in Munich.
The book covers the following topics:
	- Overview over the city districts
	- Bavarian economy
	- Media in Munich
	- Munich's upper class
	- Organised Crime
	- Important characters of the Munich runner scene

The campaign (also titled München Noir) throws the player characters into a struggle between a manager of the Bavaria Movie Studios and a dangerous neo anarchist terrorist. It consists of six adventures that lead the characters through different parts of Munich. The finale takes place on the Oktoberfest.
